entry.title: Hello World !
entry.summary:
This the classic phrase for your first step in any technology. A blog is not a language but in this context it fits.

Well, the idea behing this blog it's to avoid spam of copy/paste links to my friends via email or instant messenger. I hope that they add this blog to their RSS reader.

My posts will be usually about the projects or ideas that I am working on.

Show time !
